dependency.name: Camera {HOST.NAME} has not been pingable for more than {$UNIFI_ALERT_LONG_PERIOD}

item.name: Outoing Bandwidth Moving Average Threshold Raw
item.params:
( last(//tx_bandwidth_smooth,#1:now-1d) + last(//tx_bandwidth_smooth,#1:now-2d) + last(//tx_bandwidth_smooth,#1:now-3d) + last(//tx_bandwidth_smooth,#1:now-4d) + last(//tx_bandwidth_smooth,#1:now-5d) + last(//tx_bandwidth_smooth,#1:now-6d) + last(//tx_bandwidth_smooth,#1:now-7d)
) /7 * 0.5

item.name: ifconfig
item.params: if ifconfig eth0 >/dev/null 2>&1 ; then ifconfig eth0; else ifconfig wlan0; fi

item.params: ( avg(//IpExtInOctets,1h:now-1d)+ avg(//IpExtInOctets,1h:now-2d)+ avg(//IpExtInOctets,1h:now-3d)+ avg(//IpExtInOctets,1h:now-4d)+ avg(//IpExtInOctets,1h:now-5d)+ avg(//IpExtInOctets,1h:now-6d)+ avg(//IpExtInOctets,1h:now-7d) ) /7*.7

template.name: Unifi SSH Host
template.description:
Link this template to Unifi APs, Switches, USGes, UDMPs, Airmax devices hosts to get availability and version tracking on top of their specific template.
This will work with any SSH host with basic UNIX on the other side really.
Additionally,. this will fill the OS version and the MAC address in the inventory section.

template.description: Link this template to all Unifi switches

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME} has not been pingable for more than {$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD}
{HOST.NAME} SSH has not been available for more than {$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD}

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)>0 and last(/Unifi Switch/up_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)="true" and last(/Unifi Switch/stp_state_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)="forwarding" and ( avg(/Unifi Switch/rx_port_[{#PORT_IDX}],{$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD})>last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)*.25 or avg(/Unifi Switch/tx_port_[{#PORT_IDX}],{$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD})>last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)*.25 )
trigger_prototype.name: {{#PORT_IS_UPLINK}.regsub("true", "Uplink")} {{#PORT_MEDIA}.regsub("SFP", \0)} Port {#PORT_IDX} above 25%

dependency.name: {{#PORT_IS_UPLINK}.regsub("true", "Uplink")} {{#PORT_MEDIA}.regsub("SFP", \0)} Port {#PORT_IDX} above 50%
dependency.expression: last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)>0 and last(/Unifi Switch/up_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)="true" and last(/Unifi Switch/stp_state_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)="forwarding" and ( avg(/Unifi Switch/rx_port_[{#PORT_IDX}],{$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD})>last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)*.5 or avg(/Unifi Switch/tx_port_[{#PORT_IDX}],{$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD})>last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)*.5 )

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)>0 and last(/Unifi Switch/up_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)="true" and last(/Unifi Switch/stp_state_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)="forwarding" and ( avg(/Unifi Switch/rx_port_[{#PORT_IDX}],{$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD})>last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)*.5 or avg(/Unifi Switch/tx_port_[{#PORT_IDX}],{$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD})>last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)*.5 )
trigger_prototype.name: {{#PORT_IS_UPLINK}.regsub("true", "Uplink")} {{#PORT_MEDIA}.regsub("SFP", \0)} Port {#PORT_IDX} above 50%

dependency.name: {{#PORT_IS_UPLINK}.regsub("true", "Uplink")} {{#PORT_MEDIA}.regsub("SFP", \0)} Port {#PORT_IDX} above 75%
dependency.expression: last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)>0 and last(/Unifi Switch/up_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)="true" and last(/Unifi Switch/stp_state_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)="forwarding" and ( avg(/Unifi Switch/rx_port_[{#PORT_IDX}],{$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD})>last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)*.75 or avg(/Unifi Switch/tx_port_[{#PORT_IDX}],{$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD})>last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)*.75 )

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)>0 and last(/Unifi Switch/up_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)="true" and last(/Unifi Switch/stp_state_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)="forwarding" and ( avg(/Unifi Switch/rx_port_[{#PORT_IDX}],{$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD})>last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)*.75 or avg(/Unifi Switch/tx_port_[{#PORT_IDX}],{$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD})>last(/Unifi Switch/connection_speed_[{#PORT_IDX}],#1)*.75 )

item.name: Total Switch Rx Bandwidth
item.description: Total Bandwidth Received by the 8 port switch embedded in the UDMP (ports 1-8)

item.name: Total Switch Tx Bandwidth
item.description: Total Bandwidth Sent by the 8 port switch embedded in the UDMP (ports 1-8)

macro.description: AP Zabbix SSH Username - UDMP only supports root

template.name: Unifi WiFi Site
template.description: This template is meant to collect WiFi data across all of a site's APs. Assign to one of the APs and set the {$UNIFI_AP_GROUP} macro to the name of a group that contains all of the APs you want to aggregate against.

macro.description: The name of the group containing the site MAPs

trigger.expression: last(/Unifi Protect Camera/tx_bandwidth_smooth,#1) < last(/Unifi Protect Camera/outgoing_bandwidth_moving_average_threshold_raw,#1) and last(/Unifi Protect Camera/tx_bandwidth,#1) < last(/Unifi Protect Camera/outgoing_bandwidth_moving_average_threshold_raw,#1)
trigger.name: Camera {HOST.NAME} Outgoing Bandwidth Low

dependency.name: Camera {HOST.NAME} has not been pingable for more than {$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD}
Camera {HOST.NAME} Outgoing Bandwidth Low
Camera {HOST.NAME} SSH has not been available for more than {$UNIFI_ALERT_PERIOD}

trigger.expression: avg(/Unifi Protect Cloud Key/IpExtInOctets,3600s) < last(/Unifi Protect Cloud Key/incoming_bandwidth_moving_average_threshold,#1)
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Incoming Bandwidth Too Low
{HOST.NAME} Incoming Bandwidth Too Low

trigger.expression: last(/Unifi Protect NVR4/ssh.run[temp1],#1)>{$UNIFI_ALERT_TEMP} or last(/Unifi Protect NVR4/ssh.run[temp2],#1)>{$UNIFI_ALERT_TEMP} or last(/Unifi Protect NVR4/ssh.run[temp3],#1)>{$UNIFI_ALERT_TEMP}
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} is hot

trigger.expression: last(/Unifi SSH High Priority Host/load_avg_15mn,#1)>last(/Unifi SSH High Priority Host/ssh-run.sh["-d","{HOST.CONN}", "-u", "{$UNIFI_USER}", "-i", "{$UNIFI_SSH_PRIV_KEY_PATH}", "-p", "{$UNIFI_SSHPASS_PASSWORD_PATH}", "nproc" ],#1)*{$UNIFI_LOAD_AVERAGE_HIGH}
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} load average is > {$UNIFI_LOAD_AVERAGE_HIGH} per processor
{HOST.NAME} load average is > {$UNIFI_LOAD_AVERAGE_HIGH} per processor

trigger.expression: last(/Unifi SSH High Priority Host/load_avg_15mn,#1)>last(/Unifi SSH High Priority Host/ssh-run.sh["-d","{HOST.CONN}", "-u", "{$UNIFI_USER}", "-i", "{$UNIFI_SSH_PRIV_KEY_PATH}", "-p", "{$UNIFI_SSHPASS_PASSWORD_PATH}", "nproc" ],#1)*{$UNIFI_LOAD_AVERAGE_MEDIUM}
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Load average is > {$UNIFI_LOAD_AVERAGE_MEDIUM} per processor

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME} load average is > {$UNIFI_LOAD_AVERAGE_HIGH} per processor
dependency.expression: last(/Unifi SSH High Priority Host/load_avg_15mn,#1)>last(/Unifi SSH High Priority Host/ssh-run.sh["-d","{HOST.CONN}", "-u", "{$UNIFI_USER}", "-i", "{$UNIFI_SSH_PRIV_KEY_PATH}", "-p", "{$UNIFI_SSHPASS_PASSWORD_PATH}", "nproc" ],#1)*{$UNIFI_LOAD_AVERAGE_HIGH}

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} Load average is > {$UNIFI_LOAD_AVERAGE_MEDIUM} per processor

dependency.name: {HOST.NAME} load average is > {$UNIFI_LOAD_AVERAGE_HIGH} per processor
